text: is a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Kurumaya was born in Kumamoto on April 5, 1992. When he was a University of Tsukuba student, he joined J1 League club Kawasaki Frontale in 2014. He became a regular player as left side back from 2015. In 2017, Kawasaki won the J1 League champions first time in the club history. Kawasaki won the J1 champions in 2018 and 2020. On October 10, 2017, Kurumaya debuted for the Japan national team against Haiti.
